modName: Queenieangels Raysha Rah- a request from Testingone
summary: This is Raysha Rah with Sevenbase Body ( with or without Tattoos ) - optional UNPB Body, ADEC and CBBE Body.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]

[/size][img]https://i.imgur.com/FhBmEI4.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=5][color=#6aa84f][i]This is Raysha Rah with Sevenbase Body (with or without Tattoos)-optional UNPB Body,ADEC or CBBE Body[/i][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#b6d7a8][size=3][i]A request from Testingone[/i][/size][/color][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10556647/?][color=#5ea2e5]Testingone[/color][/url]



[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=4][i]This is a Standalone Mod[/i][/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][i][size=4]Location:[/size][/i][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#b6d7a8][size=3][i]Raysha Rah-Redguard/ Hunter/Levl.10: You find Raysha in BleakcoastCave01.[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/azb8Unf.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Dxiz8Ag.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/uQODSZE.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/a8ngOp1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/QGuUwOW.jpg[/img]


[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][size=4][i]Recommend:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#d9ead3][size=3][i]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[color=#d9ead3]
[color=#93c47d][size=3][i]YOU NEED THIS OR ELSE YOU WILL CRASH TO THE DESKTOP!!![/i][/size][/color][/color]
[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=3][i]
[size=4][color=#d9ead3]Does not replace anything in Game!![/color]
[/size][/i][/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][size=4][i]Mods that I use for Raysha:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?][color=#5ea2e5]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?][color=#5ea2e5]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666//?][color=#5ea2e5]FemFeet by Phygit[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?][color=#5ea2e5]TroubleMakers Clothing UNPB also BBP and BBPx - UNPB Body Main Page by MrTroubleMaker[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?][color=#5ea2e5]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?][color=#5ea2e5]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?][color=#5ea2e5]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?][color=#5ea2e5]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?][color=#5ea2e5]Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible by AcDale[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?][color=#5ea2e5]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?][color=#5ea2e5]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783/?][color=#5ea2e5]HN66s Long Eye Lashes by humannature66[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?][color=#5ea2e5]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53012/?][color=#5ea2e5]Remodeled Armor for SeveNBase BombShell BBP by RickerHK[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4425231/?][color=#5ea2e5]Tattoo by ewi65[/color][/url]


[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][size=4][i]Manually Installation:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=3][i]Copy the ESP, Meshes and Textures-Folder[/i]
[i]and paste it in your Data- Folder,[/i]
[i]and confirm to overwrite if you already[/i]
[i]have a Meshes and Textures Folder there.[/i][/size][/color][/font]
